Posts.Content: Nov 29, 2012 07:06PM lovelikecrazy wrote: Hello blessings and Janeth, thanks for the responses.  I am so lucky to have friends far and near and now friends on the internet.  It is a great support for me. Tomorrow I will have my first chemo.  That should be interesting. My husband and my mother wil go with me.  I think it is even harder for them than it is for me.  Tough to see them so sad.  I have a peace, yes, a peace that passes understanding.  What a ride.
Posts.Title: Glad to be moving ahead lovelikecrazy lovelikecrazy

Posts.Content: Dec 7, 2012 01:08PM lovelikecrazy wrote: I am on Day 7 after Adriamyacin and Cytoxan treatment.  Also just started an antibiotic for a small infection.  I have had a headache that has lasted all day.  I have taken acetaminphin with no relief.  Any suggestions?
Posts.Title: Glad to be moving ahead lovelikecrazy lovelikecrazy

Posts.Content: Dec 1, 2012 02:02AM lovelikecrazy wrote: Thanks Lewing.  I'm feeling very positive.  People supporting me is very special.  For those around me that I bump into occasionally, I feel like the care and effort I have put into my realationship with them, It is coming back in huge rewards.  What you sew, so shall you reap.
